bibliographicInfo.title: Analysis and Optimization of Systems : Proceedings of the Fourth International Conference on Analysis and Optimization of Systems Versailles, December 16-19, 1980

alternativeTitles.alternative: INRIA, Institut National de Recherche en Informatique et en Automatique

abstracts.abstract: Singular perturbation modeling of Markov processes -- Computer control systems of a bloom caster -- Simulation d'un train finisseur de laminage à chaud -- Robust multivariable PI-controller for distributed parameter systems -- Optimisation et centralisation de la gestion de l'energie sur un site industriel complexe -- Status of the state space theory of linear hereditary differential systems with delays in state and control variables -- Algebraic criteria of approximate controllability of retarded systems -- A polynomial matrix solution of the disturbance localization problem -- Stabilisation of bilinear systems, performance specification and optimality -- Comparison of multivariable MBH realization algorithms in the presence of multiple poles, and noise disturbing the Markov sequence -- Adaptive filter theory and applications -- Musmar: Basic convergence and consistency properties -- Commande adaptative explicite — Un exemple -- Discrete time adaptive control for classes of nonlinear systems -- Discrete-time model reference multivariable adaptive control applications to electrical power plants -- Computational problems in nonlinear filtering -- Recent results in non-linear filtering -- Least squares identification for continuous-time systems -- On the Gohberg-Kerin factorization and the conjugate process -- Theoreme de separation pour le controle impulsionnel cas markovien a espace d'etat fini -- Stochastic control under partial observations -- A stochastic variational approach to the duality between estimation and control: Continuous time -- The optimal cost expansion of finite controls finite states Markov chains with weak and strong interactions -- On degenerate variational and quasi-variational inequalities of parabolic type -- A control-theoretic view on incentives -- Survey of leader-follower concepts in hierarchical decision-making -- Memory strategies and a general theory for stackelberg games with partial state information -- The nucleolus and the essential coalitions -- Gradient type optimization methods to solve differential games applied to tri-dimensional air-to-air combats -- Controle optimal et sous-optimal des systems distribues -- Multilevel stackelberg control of distributed-parameter systems -- Modelisation et identification parametrique d'un processus de diffusion assistee par implantation de protons -- Control of parallel current and countercurrent hèat exchangers -- Application of adaptive control to a bubble-column-fermenter -- Regularity of optimal boundary controls for parabolic equations -- Nonlinear realization theory -- Almost noninteracting control design using dynamic state feedback -- New results on linear feedback decoupling -- Cycles limites et boucles de retroaction -- Vers une approche algébrique des systèmes non linéaires en temps discret -- The applications of control theory to economics -- Estimation of unobserved rational expectations with an application to the german hyperinflation -- Policy optimisation algorithms for nonlinear econometric models -- Adaptive control of linear decentralized econometric models -- Recursive estimation of price expectations in economics -- Recent results in recursive and nonlinear image restoration -- Generalized cooley-tukey algorithms for evaluation of multi-dimensional discrete fourier transforms -- Feedback design techniques for linear multivariable 2-D systems -- Stability of multidimensional systems -- Optimization techniques in image analysis -- A stochastic method for modeling fluid displacement in petroleum reservoirs -- Ajustement automatique de modeles de gisements petroliers : application a l'interpretation d'essais d'interferences sur le gisement de chuelles -- Simulation numerique de deplacements bidimensionnels d'huile par de l'eau -- Some selected topics in research and application of reservoir simulation -- The role of multi-microcomputers in automatic control -- Nouvelle methodologie de l'instrumentation a microcalculateurs, destinee a ameliorer la conduite automatique des procedes industriels -- A two level realization of self-tuning regulator in a multi-microcomputer process control system -- Online control of immobilized enzyme reactors a microprocessor implementation -- Adaptive control of generator voltage using microcomputers simulation -- C. A. O. de l'implantation optimale de programmes de commande.

bibliographicInfo.description: Campusweiter Zugriff (Universität Hannover). - Vervielfältigungen (z.B. Kopien, Downloads) sind nur von einzelnen Kapiteln oder Seiten und nur zum eigenen wissenschaftlichen Gebrauch erlaubt. Keine Weitergabe an Dritte. Kein systematisches Downloaden durch Robots.
